response.original_title: Operação Senta a púa - traição no alto comando
response.overview: A group of drug dealers, located in the outskirts of the Federal District, is involved in a corruption and drug distribution scheme.  Without being able to involve any military of the unit itself, the commander of the III FAE, Brigadier Montgomery, will have to  count on the help of someone to carry out the suicidal mission of trying to locate the traffickers, in order to inform  the actual location to the Federal Police.  Aided by diplomat Rodrigo, Brigadier Montgomery remembers a former captain who was involved in the plane crash of the 1907 Gol aircraft,  in 2006, and for that reason he was dismissed from the corporation.  Will this former Air Force captain, already forgotten by everyone, be able to help the Air Force and the Federal Police to locate and  arrest this dreaded group of drug dealers?
response.tagline: Senta a púa operation - betrayal on the high comand
response.title: Senta a púa operation - betrayal on the high comand

results.name: Operação Senta a púa: Traição no alto comando!
